posts.description: December 28, 2016 I maintain over many open source projects on GitHub and elsewhere (over 160 as of this writing). I have merged and/or closed thousands of Pull Requests (PRs) and patches in the past few years, and would like to summarize here many of the reasons I don't merge many PRs. A few of my…

posts.message: What is the best tutorial or book to start learning "machine learning" with python ?

******** Architects Support needed ********* 

I have a friend who is PHD student and searching for architects for his research as following :

research interview:
"I am currently making a study on the usage of developers community web sites (e.g. Blogs and forums, Stackoverflow) to find architecture knowledge. To achieve this goal, I am planning to meet with architects and experts who could give me insight from their experience about this topic.
The interview will take 30-45 mins "

If you can help , please let me know !

انا اندرويد ديفيلوبر و بتسخدم لينكس (حاليا اوبونتو و بفكر استخدم ديبيان)، انا بستخدمه لأنه مجانا و دايما بشوف الناس علي quora بتقول ان الديفيلوبر المفروض يستخدم لينكس لأن الشغل عليه اسهل من ويندوز و ان الشركات بتفضل الناس اللي عندها خبرة مع لينكس هل الكلام ده صحيح سواء شركات في مصر او بره مصر؟
are there any companies in alexandria that work in firmware/architectural design/ embedded systems ?

شباب، حد يحب يشتغل معايا على المشروع دة؟
https://www.innocentive.com/ar/challenge/9933942

This is called "innovation challenge", with a reward of $25,000. If you're not familiar with Innocentive, it is basically a platform that connects companies seeking innovative solutions to certain problems/challenges they face, with solvers who can provide such solutions. Most of the challenges  are very industry-specific, but this one is pretty doable with some of the skills and expertise available here. Read the details and if you're interested PM me with your expertise and let's form a team and win :) btw I happened to win a couple of such challenges before so that's why I say it's doable :)
posts.caption: innocentive.com
posts.description: As part of a clinical trial, patients are sometimes asked to record information between office visits. The patient’s assessment of a finding may not match the clinical diagnosis. It would be helpful for subjects to be able to document each event with an image that can be shared with their physician....
